verbose_text: Sadagopan et al. [XREF_BIBR] recently studied the relationships between ANG and p53 in vitro in normal endothelial cells, transformed human embryonic kidney cells, human osteosarcoma cells, and cancer cell lines (human colon carcinoma, neuroblastoma, hepatocellular carcinoma, and lung adenocarcinoma), and suggested that ANG promotes cell survival by inhibiting the antiapoptotic function of p53.
